balances.description: Object containing information about the account balances.

currency.description: The currency used for the account balances.

primary.description: Indicates if the balance is the primary account balance.

total_balance.description: Total balance in the account, including all funds.

currency_code.description: The currency code for the total balance.

value.description: The numerical value of the total balance.

currency_code.description: The currency code for the available balance.

value.description: The numerical value of the available balance.

withheld_balance.description: Balance that is currently being withheld or pending.

currency_code.description: The currency code for the withheld balance.

value.description: The numerical value of the withheld balance.

account_id.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the balances data.

as_of_time.description: The timestamp when the balances data was reported.

last_refresh_time.description: The timestamp when the balances data was last refreshed or updated.
